nodes.text: Herzfall Corporation, also known as Herzfall Communications, was a small communications corporation based in Senex sector, developing lightweight communications gear. In 22 BBY, Herzfall signed an endorsement deal with Deme Tryshyn, a grav-ball player who was the highest scorer in the history of the sport. During the Galactic Civil War, Herzfall produced the DH107 which was used by the Imperial Army.
